name: Blip (KekkoDude)
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 47!

In the Top-Down Adventurer of the year you take control over our protagonist, Blip!

Blip is a Blimp, like many others on his strange little world. Their lifespan is short but they are a bunch of industrious fellas.

What wild adventures wait for Blip in his short life, Maybe a tale of love and merriment. Perhaps an adventure to the edge of the world, Or maybe it all ends before it should!

Use W to move forward towards the mouse, you also have the ability to Dash forward by pressing Space.

You can interact with the Friendly Blimp next to your nest and various items around by pressing E. 

By pressing Q you can check what time of day it is.
